Literature.Title: Brevinin-2GHk From Sylvirana guentheri and the Design of Truncated Analogs Exhibiting the Enhancement of Antimicrobial Activity
Literature.Author: Chen G, Miao Y, Ma C, Zhou M, Shi Z, Chen X, Burrows JF, Xi X, Chen T, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:18% Killing=100 µM,Horse erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=16µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=32µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MBC=4µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MBC=16µM)
